ygData.subject: RE: Survey results ???? - my 2 coppers
ygData.msgSnippet: And the other consideration this brings up is that you can t even put a NO DROP item in the bank. You have to carry it around with you. ... From:	Avron
ygData.messageBody:
And the other consideration this brings up is that you can't even put a
NO DROP item in the bank. You have to carry it around with you.

-----Original Message-----
From: Avron Elselynn [mailto:avron@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 12:00 PM
Subject: SV: [EverQuest] Survey results ???? - my
2 coppers

From: "Avron Elselynn" <avron@...>

I just dont want everything to be nodrop so it hinders
the trade economy, I want to be able to trade away my old weapon for a
new one and a shitload of platina, when I can, instead of just putting
the old weapon in the bank to rot away, or destroying it..
